attributes.additional_details: I request the issue of Private hire licencing be debated in parliament. and that Licencing fee & conditions to be set to a standard rate, across the country. We are unable to  drop off/ pick up  outside hotels, stop on Red Routes or  use Bus Lanes. This  effectively prevents us from competing  and doing our jobs. We are doing much  the same job & paying similar licence fees,  but with less legal rights rights.
